name: Long Barrel Curling Iron 1.5u201c Nanolonic MX
about: What it is:An award-winning tool that gives you more to love with a two-inch-longer barrel than the average curling iron, so you can quickly create loose curls..Hair Texture:Straight and Wavy.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Curl Enhancing.Key Benefits:- Creates soft waves and loose curls.What Else You Need to Know:Combining Nanolonic MX and Bio Ionic Moisturizing Heat, this curling iron locks in moisture, seals the cuticle, and ensures curls last while staying conditioned and bouncy instead of dull and limp.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-The extended-barrel design allows you to curl the hair at the back of your head easier, whether your hair is long or short.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample.  My daughter used this curling iron more than me as she has long straight hair.  This curling iron gave her lasting soft curls and only took her under 20 minutes to curl her hair. This doesn't dry her hair and has a healthy shine. The barrel is long for her long hair. Must have for those that has long hair.
